description:
Let this course help you to start your day right! Learn to prepare some of the classic sandwiches prepared using a sandwich maker.

The recipes in this course are easy to make with an easy step by step cooking procedure.

Here are some of the all-time favorite sandwiches you will learn to make in this course: Tuna Sandwich, Egg Sandwich, Ham and Cheese, Apple and Cinnamon Sandwich.

If you have just bought a sandwich maker and is looking for ideas on what to make, then you will enjoy this fun and fast way to make delicious breakfast sandwiches. This course is a good start for you. The recipes are also good if you use good old fashioned pots and pans.

Each section of this course presents a new recipe. Each section is composed of two lectures. The first lecture will show you how to make the dish and in the second lecture, you can find the recipe. You can also find a downloadable file under the second lecture in each section which you can print out for yourself.
title: Cooking Class - 10 Easy Breakfast Sandwich Maker Recipes
